com.excilys.computerdb.dao

Interface ComputerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComputerDAOImpl

    public interface ComputerDAO
    Author:
    Steven Fougeron

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        java.util.List<Computer> findAll(Page page)
        Get all computer from the database
        Returns:
        listCompany, a ArrayList containing all the computer in database with every details (id, name, date, date, company)

      • findById

        Computer findById(int id)
        Get all the computer with the id in parameter
        Parameters:
        id - to look for
        Returns:
        a list of computer (normally only 1 instance of computer if id in unique)

      • findByName

        java.util.List<Computer> findByName(java.lang.String name)
        Get all the computer with a name starting with the parameter name, an empty array otherwise
        Parameters:
        name - : name of the computer to find
        Returns:
        a list of Computer corresponding to the name

      • insertComputer

        void insertComputer(Computer computer)
        Insert a computer taken in parameter in database
        Parameters:
        computer - to insert

      • updateComputer

        void updateComputer(Computer computer)
        Update a computer taken in parameter in database the computer at the id(Parameter) by the computer in Parameter
        Parameters:
        id - to update
        computer - will replace the computer at id = id(Parameters)

      • deleteComputer

        void deleteComputer(int id)
        Delete computer in database at ID
        Parameters:
        id - : id to delete

      • countComputer

        int countComputer()
        Send back the number of computer in db
        Returns:
        an int
